SEARCH
Package main.java.server

Class OnlineGameManager

java.lang.Object
main.java.server.OnlineGameManager
public class OnlineGameManager extends Object
This class allows you to interpret received messages and organize multiplayer games by translating instructions on a game into a request to the game model.
